original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role offers a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, empowering you to bridge the gap between complex business processes and effective system configurations. As a key player, you will ensure our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently, with a strong focus on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space. Leveraging cutting-edge ML and AI technologies, you will drive the creation of innovative and streamlined solutions that enhance our operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders from various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging database querying, report generation, and data visualization tools to uncover insights.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the quality and effectiveness of your work.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and facilitate knowledge sharing.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex technical challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with a solid understanding of database concepts and data manipulation techniques
- Experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to enhance system efficiency and performance

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and configuration management
- Hands-on experience in the vehicle configuration domain, understanding the unique requirements and complexities of this industry

Required Experience:
- Demonstrable experience in the implementation and optimization of ML and AI solutions to drive process improvements and system enhancements

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration systems and the ability to leverage that knowledge to enhance our offerings

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using database querying and reporting tools, such as SQL, to extract and analyze data
- Familiarity with version control systems, configuration management tools, and project management software

Unlock your potential as a versatile professional who seamlessly blends business acumen with technical expertise. In this dynamic role, you will be a key driver in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of our business and operate at peak efficiency. With a strong focus on the vehicle configuration space, you will leverage cutting-edge ML and AI technologies to develop innovative solutions that streamline our operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Serve as a trusted partner to stakeholders across various departments, collaborating to understand their unique business needs, gathering comprehensive requirements, and documenting them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, showcasing your ability to develop and maintain configuration specifications, create and modify data mappings and integrations, implement and thoroughly test new configurations, and swiftly resolve any configuration-related issues.
- Dive deep into our existing data, leveraging your analytical prowess to identify trends, uncover inefficiencies, and pinpoint areas for improvement. Utilize database querying, report generation, and data visualization tools to transform raw data into actionable insights.
- Proactively champion opportunities to streamline our business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices.
- Ensure the quality and effectiveness of your work by thoroughly testing configurations and actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) alongside cross-functional teams.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps, serving as a valuable knowledge repository to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to guarantee smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to tackle complex technical challenges
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively engage with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proven track record of translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Expertise in Java and SQL, combined with a deep understanding of database concepts and data manipulation techniques
- Demonstrated experience in the successful implementation and optimization of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and configuration management
- In-depth understanding of the vehicle configuration domain and the ability to leverage that knowledge to enhance our offerings

Required Experience:
- Substantial experience in the implementation and optimization of ML and AI solutions to drive process improvements and system enhancements

Preferred Experience:
- Track record of working in an Agile environment and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration systems and the ability to apply that expertise to improve our solutions

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using advanced database querying and reporting tools, such as SQL, to extract, analyze, and visualize data
- Expertise in leveraging version control systems, configuration management tools, and project management software to ensure the seamless delivery of your work

Embark on an exciting journey as a strategic technical partner, blending your business acumen and technical proficiency to shape the future of our [mention specific system] backend. In this pivotal role, you will be a driving force in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of our business and operate at the highest levels of efficiency. With a keen focus on the vehicle configuration space, you will harness the power of cutting-edge ML and AI technologies to develop innovative solutions that redefine industry standards.

Key Responsibilities:
- Establish yourself as a trusted advisor to stakeholders across various departments, collaborating closely to deeply understand their unique business needs, gather comprehensive requirements, and document them using industry-leading techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Leverage your technical expertise to translate these business requirements into robust, scalable, and future-proof configurations within our [mention specific system]
